tasks.prompt: Complete the signup process by providing username:newuser<web_agent_id>, email:newuser<web_agent_id>@gmail.com, and password:password123

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test verifies that the Web Agent successfully completed the registration process by ensuring a registration event was triggered with the specified username 'newuser<web_agent_id>'. This confirms the user account was created as instructed in the task prompt.

use_case.name: User Registration
use_case.description: The user fills out the registration form and successfully creates a new account.

examples.prompt: Register with the following username:<username>,email:<email> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a registration event with a specific username.

examples.prompt: Create a new account with username:<username>,email:<email> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires registration with a specific username.

examples.prompt: Fill the registration form with username:<username>, email:<email> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires registration with both username and email specified.

examples.prompt: Sign up for an account with username:<username>,email:<email> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires registration with a specific username.

tasks.prompt: Enter the login credentials with username:user<web_agent_id> and password:password123 to access the account

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test validates that the login event was triggered with the correct username as specified in the task prompt, confirming the agent successfully logged in with the provided credentials.

use_case.name: User Login
use_case.description: The user fills out the login form and logs in successfully.

examples.prompt: Login for the following username:<username>  and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a login event.

examples.prompt: Login with a specific username:<username>  and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a login event.

examples.prompt: Fill the Login Form with a specific username:<username> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a login event.

examples.prompt: Sign in to the website username:<username> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a login event.

tasks.prompt: Find the film titled 'Inception' in the database

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to verify that the Web Agent correctly searches for the specific film title 'Inception' as required by the task prompt.

use_case.name: Search Film
use_case.description: The user searches for a film using a query.

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires searching for a specific film title 'Pulp Fiction'.
This test applies when the task requires searching for a specific film title 'Forrest Gump'.
